sn22.67:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.67:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu …pe… atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.67:1.4: “Yam kho, bhikkhu, dukkham; tatra te chando pahatabbo”ti.
sn22.67:2.1: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi”ti?
sn22.67:2.2: “Rupam kho, bhante, dukkham; tatra me chando pahatabbo.
sn22.67:2.6: vinnanam dukkham; tatra me chando pahatabbo.
sn22.67:2.7: Imassa khvaham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami”ti.
sn22.67:3.2: Sadhu kho tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi.
sn22.67:3.3: Rupam kho, bhikkhu, dukkham; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn22.67:3.7: vinnanam dukkham; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn22.67:3.8: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attho datthabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.67:3.9: annataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahatam ahositi.
